author: bendavid
body:
1) Store timing information in PackedCandidates for MiniAOD usage

2) Add timing information also for GSF tracks and consistently propagate to electron PFCandidates

3) Add use of timing information in PrimaryVertexAssignment for use in primary vertex sorting

4 ) Make it possible to use PrimaryVertexAssignment class for PF(No)Pileup and for Puppi, in order to consolidate different track-primary vertex association logic into a single place.  This is switched on (only) for all phase 2 scenarios for the moment, and timing information is therefore automatically used in the timing scenarios

This means that primary vertex reconstruction and sorting, CHS and Puppi Jets and MET now fully make use of timing information for charged particles in the relevant scenarios.

@lgray @gpetruc @arizzi @violatingcp 

@isobelojalvo depending on exactly how the inputs to the tau reconstruction are arranged, these changes to PFPileup and CHS may already partly propagate there (and if not should be easy to adapt tau reco such that they do)
title: Complete propagation of precision timing to reconstruction and MiniAOD
